snippet.title: Pier Pressure Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Pier Pressure, the ridiculous sea-themed SHMUP, is now available to Windows, Linux, and Mac users on Steam and itch.io for $4.99USD!

Wake up and smell the larceny, the museum under your watch has been burgled! Take off in one of three unique ships and blast your way through sky and sea to retrieve the stolen Power Pearl. Strategically trade health energy for upgrades and subweapons, and recover by wiping out your enemies! Confront the fabulously buff crawfish scientist Tony and undo your mistake; your job is on the line!

Get it now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1386160/Pier_Pressure/

Get it now on itch.io!
https://headcannon.itch.io/pier-pressure

Join the discussion on Discord!
https://t.co/26dgTfBWti

Follow us on Twitter and Facebook!
https://twitter.com/Head_cannon
https://www.facebook.com/Headcannon-117031702326433
